name: The Adventures Of JOQUE
description:
Hi! Welcome to the adventures of Joque, a small green bug with hair and a daredevil's spirit. 

Controls:
Use the left and right arrow keys to move left and right respectfully, use the up arrow to jump and when you arrive at the door at the top, wait for the door to open and then press down.


Status:
Currently, there only five levels with increasing difficulty. Each level has been tested and proven to be possible. There are no music and sound effects yet as I am still working on it.

Anyways, Hope you enjoy!
